name: Quinoa Salad with Roasted Vegetables
steps: Chop the bell peppers, zucchini, and red onion into bite-sized pieces.
Toss the chopped vegetables with olive oil, salt, and pepper, then spread them on a baking sheet.
Roast the vegetables in the oven for 20-25 minutes, until tender and slightly browned.
In the meantime, cook the quinoa according to package instructions.
Once the quinoa and vegetables are done, let them cool slightly before combining in a large bowl.
Add lemon juice, fresh parsley, and additional salt and pepper to taste.
Serve the quinoa salad warm or cold.
